00019                 public function index()
00020                 {
00021                         $this->common();

00024                 public function common()
00025                 {
00026                         global $js_files;
00027                         
00028                         $this->mimetype = 'application/x-javascript';
00029                         $this->response->body = '';
00030                         $mtime = 0;
00031                         foreach ($js_files as $js_file)
00032                         {
00033                                 $js_file = dirname(__FILE__) . '/../' . $js_file;
00034                                 $mtime = max($mtime, filemtime($js_file));
00035                                 $this->response->body .= file_get_contents($js_file);
00036                         }
00037                         $this->response->add_header('Content-Type', $this->mimetype);
00038                         $this->response->add_header('Cache-Control', 'max-age=86400');
00039                         $this->response->add_header('Pragma', 'max-age=86400');
00040                         $this->response->add_header('Last-Modified', gmstrftime('%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S %Z', $mtime));
00041                         $this->response->add_header('Date', gmstrftime('%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S %Z'));
00042                         $this->response->add_header('Expires', gmstrftime('%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S %Z', time() + 86400));
00043 
00044                         $this->render(NULL);
00045                 }
00046         }
